description.P:
wxMacMolPlt is a cross-platform (Mac OS X, Linux and Windows) gui for preparing, submitting and visualizing input and output for the GAMESS quantum chemistry package. Features include a graphical molecule builder, GAMESS input generation, animation of output and visualization of molecules, normal modes, orbitals and other properties.
See the included html manual or the homepage for more details.
http://brettbode.github.io/wxmacmolplt/annotation.jpg A simple sample showing the molecular display and an annotation.
http://brettbode.github.io/wxmacmolplt/ MMP.Guy@gmail.com
